author: Unity
description:
If you are using modular assets to build your scenes, you can improve performance by combining them into a single mesh. Unity's Mesh.CombineMeshes method makes this efficient. All you need is a parent object with a Mesh Filter component and a Mesh Renderer component with a shared material assigned.

Learn more in docs: https://on.unity.com/CombineMeshesDoc

Find more free Unity learn resources: https://on.unity.com/Learn

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity 6 tips: Combine Meshes #gamedev #gamedevelopment #unity
